content.rendered:
NCAA Eligibility Denied Courses

The following courses do not currently qualify as NCAA core courses and therefore cannot be used for NCAA initial-eligibility certification.

 English

  • Literature and Film

 Mathematics

  • Foundations in Higher Math
  • Topics in Algebra 2

Science

  • Living Environment Essentials
  • Science Research

Social Studies

  • Exploring Teaching as a Profession
